document_data.name: Yontur Harhallo
document_data.mainbody: '''Yontur Harhallo''' was the owner and manager of [[Harhallo's Warmhearth House]], a quiet inn located in [[Khôltar]], [[south Faerûn]], ''circa'' the [[1372 DR|Year of Wild Magic, 1372 DR]].{{Cite web/Elminster Speaks archive|77}}{{Cite web/Elminster Speaks/Part 59: Khôltar, Part 10, Hungry in Handrornlar, and More}}
document_data.Personality: Yontur accepted his lot with equanimity, rarely getting upset about anything. He was kind and had made many friends over the years.
document_data.History: Yontur grew up in the family business and was the third generation of Harhallos to run the establishment.
